org.fcrepo.kernel.impl

Class FedoraResourceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
      • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.FedoraResourceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FedoraJcrTypes, FedoraResource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatastreamImpl, FedoraObjectImpl

    public class FedoraResourceImpl
extends org.modeshape.jcr.api.JcrTools
implements FedoraJcrTypes, FedoraResource
    Common behaviors across FedoraObject and Datastream types; also used when the exact type of an object is irrelevant
    Author:
    ajs6f

                                                    String sparqlUpdateStatement)
                                                      throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: FedoraResource
        Update the properties Dataset with a SPARQL Update query. The updated properties may be serialized to the JCR store. After applying the statement, clients SHOULD check the result of #getDatasetProblems, which may include problems when attempting to serialize the data to JCR.
        Specified by:

      • getEtagValue

        public String getEtagValue()
                    throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: FedoraResource
        Construct an ETag value from the last modified date and path. JCR has a mix:etag type, but it only takes into account binary properties. We actually want whole-object etag data. TODO : construct and store an ETag value on object modify
        Specified by:
        getEtagValue in interface FedoraResource
        Returns:
        constructed etag value
        Throws:
